incident.name: Network problems in one datacenter
incident.update: At one datacenter of our server locations we experience network problems after they did some maintenance work on Sunday Dec. 7th. Services located in the DC include email, email lists, Nextcloud, git, XMPP. The DC support is looking into the problem
Functionality for IMAP and Nextcloud services have been patched. Mailingslist delivery queue has reduced to normal values, delivery of emails should be as usual.
Functionality for XMPP has been patched.
The network problem has been resolved.

incident.name: planet.fsfe.org
incident.update: The blog aggregator is currently not available. Reasons are being investigated.

incident.name: Mailinglist
incident.update: The mailing lists are fully operational again, including the web interface.

incident.name: wiki.fsfe.org
incident.update: After a DDoS to the service we temporarily forbit some event listings.

incident.name: git.fsfe.org
incident.update: We are having issues with AI scrapers overloading the git server.
We have deployed anubis in front of the git service. Depending on the development of AI DDoS you may be redirected to the login page to access certain functionality or pages/files.
